title: ASL 1.10 — Food & Drink
objectives: Learn core food signs (APPLE, BREAD, WATER, COFFEE, TEA).

sections.prompt: Pair drill: Ask 'YOU LIKE ___?' and respond with LIKE/DON’T-LIKE.
Was it easier to sign foods you actually like or those you don’t like?

reflectionPrompt: Record a 20–30s clip signing 3 foods you like and 2 you dislike.
